hero.title: About YALS
hero.subtitle: Founded in 2017 in Kinshasa, Young African Leaders School is a premium, English-speaking international school dedicated to shaping Africa's next generation of leaders.
hero.description: At YALS, we believe that quality education is the foundation of strong leadership. Our mission is to provide a world-class, English-immersive education that empowers students to become confident, capable leaders who can make a positive impact in their communities and beyond.

story.title: Our Story
content: Young African Leaders School (YALS) was founded in 2017 by a group of passionate educators and community leaders who recognized the need for high-quality, English-language education in Kinshasa. Starting with just 35 students and 5 teachers, our school has grown to serve hundreds of students across all grade levels.

Our founders envisioned a school that would not only provide academic excellence but would also instill leadership values, global awareness, and community responsibility. This vision continues to guide our approach to education today.

Over the years, YALS has established itself as a premier educational institution in the Democratic Republic of Congo, known for its rigorous academic standards, English immersion environment, and focus on developing well-rounded future leaders.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: These principles guide everything we do at YALS, from curriculum development to community engagement.

excellence.title: Academic Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain high standards and expectations, challenging our students to achieve their full potential through rigorous, engaging curriculum and innovative teaching methods.

leadership.title: Leadership Development
leadership.description: We cultivate leadership skills in every student, encouraging them to take initiative, solve problems creatively, and make positive contributions to their communities.

global.title: Global Perspective
global.description: We prepare students to be global citizens by exposing them to diverse cultures, languages, and perspectives, fostering respect and understanding for people from all backgrounds.

character.title: Character Building
character.description: We emphasize integrity, responsibility, empathy, and resilience as essential qualities for personal growth and effective leadership.

innovation.title: Innovation & Creativity
innovation.description: We encourage creative thinking and innovative approaches to learning and problem-solving, preparing students for the challenges of a rapidly changing world.

community.title: Community Engagement
community.description: We believe in the importance of service and active participation in community life, teaching students to use their knowledge and skills for the greater good.

english.title: English Immersion
english.description: At YALS, all classes are taught in English by qualified educators, creating a full immersion environment that helps students develop strong English language skills naturally and effectively.

smallClasses.title: Small Class Sizes

stem.title: STEM Focus

leadership.title: Leadership Integration
leadership.description: Leadership principles are woven throughout our curriculum and extracurricular activities, giving students regular opportunities to practice and develop their leadership abilities.

hero.title: Tuition & Fees
hero.description: Investing in your child's education at YALS provides exceptional value with our comprehensive academic programs and enriching extracurricular activities.

preschool.title: Preschool & Kindergarten
preschool.overview: Our early childhood program focuses on creating a nurturing environment where young learners can develop foundational skills through play-based learning, creative activities, and early English language immersion.

elementary.title: Elementary School
elementary.overview: Our elementary program builds strong academic foundations while fostering critical thinking, creativity, and leadership skills. Students benefit from our English immersion environment and STEM-focused curriculum.

secondary.title: Middle & High School
secondary.overview: Our secondary education program prepares students for higher education and future careers with advanced academics, leadership opportunities, and global perspectives. Students develop critical thinking, communication skills, and community engagement.

payment.title: Payment Options
payment.description: We offer flexible payment plans to accommodate different family needs.

annual.title: Annual Payment
annual.description: Pay the full tuition at the beginning of the academic year and receive a 5% discount.

semester.title: Semester Payment
semester.description: Pay in two installments at the beginning of each semester.

quarterly.title: Quarterly Payment
quarterly.description: Pay in four equal installments throughout the academic year.

financial.title: Financial Aid & Scholarships
financial.description: YALS is committed to making quality education accessible. We offer limited financial aid and merit-based scholarships to qualifying families.

additionalFees.question: Are there any additional fees?
additionalFees.answer: The comprehensive fee structure covers most educational expenses. Additional costs may include uniforms, optional extracurricular activities, and special events.

siblingDiscount.question: Is there a sibling discount?
siblingDiscount.answer: Yes, we offer a 10% tuition discount for each additional sibling enrolled at YALS.

refundPolicy.question: What is the refund policy?
refundPolicy.answer: Tuition refunds are prorated based on the withdrawal date. Registration fees are non-refundable. Please contact our administration office for specific details.

financialAid.question: How can I apply for financial aid?
financialAid.answer: Financial aid applications are available upon request. Families must complete the application and provide supporting financial documentation for consideration.
